mapper.select: select * from(company join hire on company.coname=hire.name) order by startdate desc
select * from(company join hire on company.coname=hire.name) order by enddate asc
select * from (company join hire on company.coname=hire.name) order by hits desc
select * from(company join hire on company.coname=hire.name) where hino=#{hino}
select * from(company join hire on company.coname=hire.name) where cono=#{cono}

select * from (select * from hire join company on hire.name = company.coname)t join PICKEDCOMPANY on t.cono=pickedcompany.cono where pickedcompany.id=#{id} and enddate-sysdate<=3 and enddate-sysdate>=2

select * from (select * from hire join company on hire.name = company.coname)t join PICKEDCOMPANY on t.cono=pickedcompany.cono where pickedcompany.id=#{id} and enddate-sysdate<=1 and enddate-sysdate>=-1
